text.name: info1
text.text: The Family Computer Disk System, abbreviated as the FDS or FCD, is a peripheral for Nintendo's Family Computer home video game console, released only in Japan on February 21, 1986.

text.name: info1
text.text: Este acessório era utilizado no Nintendo Entertainment System. A sua distribuição ocorreu somente no Japão, mas não foi bem sucedida devido aos problemas a que esse tipo de mídia (disquete) está sujeita.

text.name: info1
text.text: The Family Computer Disk System, abbreviated as the FDS or FCD, is a peripheral for Nintendo's Family Computer home video game console, released only in Japan on February 21, 1986.

text.name: info1
text.text: The Family Computer Disk System, abreviado como FDS o FCD, es un periférico para la consola de videojuegos para el hogar de Nintendo's Family Computer, lanzado solo en Japón el 21 de febrero de 1986.

text.name: info1
text.text: Est un périphérique de la console de jeux vidéo Famicom. Vendu par Nintendo, il se place sous la console et utilise un format propriétaire de disquette permettant de stocker des jeux.

text.name: info1
text.text: Das Family Computer Disk System, abgekürzt als FDS oder FCD, ist ein Peripheriegerät für Nintendos Family Computer-Heimvideospielkonsole, das am 21. Februar 1986 nur in Japan veröffentlicht wurde.

text.name: info1
text.text: Family Computer Disk System，缩写为 FDS 或 FCD，是任天堂 Family Computer 家用视频游戏机的外围设备，于 1986 年 2 月 21 日仅在日本发布。

text.name: info1
text.text: Family Computer Disk System，縮寫為 FDS 或 FCD，是任天堂 Family Computer 家用視頻遊戲機的外圍設備，於 1986 年 2 月 21 日僅在日本發布。
